member.name: T:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile
member.summary: Support class for reading and writing objects to xml. Each object to be written or read is accessed in a generic way for the properties to write or read. This is done via an aggregate intermediate object. Objects are written once in an xml file. If they are encountered more than once, references are written. References may refer to other files. Writing and reading strings is always done and expected in neutral culture (English-US) in order to enable exchangability. Needed meta info is retrieved from MetaInfo. MetaInfo used by XmlFile

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.Read(System.Object)
member.summary: Reads an object from file The file to read should have been registered with the object earlier by a reqad or write action
member.exception: Cannot find file to read
Cannot resolve class type when an object for an xml element must be instantiated
Cannot find class type
Xml element holds a reference, but referenced object cannot be found
Schema cannot be found although it has been specified in MetaInfo
Validation error when xml file doesn't meet specified schema

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetSchema(System.Type,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a stream containing an xsd file, which resides within an assembly.

The assembly in which the xsd file resides
member.returns: The xsd stream, null if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.Read(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Object,System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Reads the current xml element into an object. Then moves the xml stream forward to the next element. If the next element is one level deeper, that element is read by calling this method recursively. Finally the current element is positioned on the first unread element. By calling this method at the top level of an xml file, the whole xml file is read.
member.param: The object which will be populated with data within the current xml element
The parent of the object, i.e. the object to which the target will be assigned
The root object of the xml file
member.exception: Read only property has null value, but a property of this object should be set according to the xml file

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetObject(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the object associated with an xml element. Different procedures are followed for the following cases: 1) The file is mentioned. Then that file is read and the top object (a.k.a. the root) of that file is returned 2) The file is mentioned and the xml element is defined as a reference. Then that file is read (if not before) and the root of the file is asked for a property with the specified reference. 3) The file isn't mentioned and the xml element is defined as a reference. Then the object is retrieved from the registration. 4) Otherwise the object is instantiated
member.param: The type to instantiate when no type is specified in the xml element
The top object of the xml stream
member.returns: The object associated with the xml element
member.exception: Cannot resolve class type when an object for an xml element must be instantiated
Cannot find class type
Cannot instantiate object for known class type
Xml element holds a reference, but referenced object cannot be found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.ReadAttributes(Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate,System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Object)
member.summary: Reads the attributes of the current xml element and uses them to populute the target with
member.param: The object which is populated with the xml attributes
Top object of the xml stream
member.exception: Cannot find class type
Cannot instantiate object for known class type

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.MoveToNextElement(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Moves the xml stream forward to the next readable element

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.CreateRegistration(System.Object)
member.summary: Sets up registration tables for a root object

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.RegisterObject(System.Object,System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Object)
member.summary: Registers that an object is written to or read from the same file as a root object. This method calls RegisterKey internally.
member.param: The object at the top of an xml file

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.RegisterKey(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Registers an object with a unique key within the scope of the root.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetRegisteredKey(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a key from registration given the object. The key will only be found if RegisterKey or RegisterObject has been called before.
member.param: The root object, the scope where is searched for the object
member.returns: The key, null if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetRegisteredTarget(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets an object from registration given the key. The object will only be found if RegisterKey or RegisterObject has been called before.
member.param: The root object, the scope where is searched for the key
member.returns: The associated object, null if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetRegisteredFile(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the file associated with an object. The object should be the root of the file, i.e. associated with the top xml element.
member.returns: The file, null if the object isn't a root of a file

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetRegisteredObjects
member.summary: Gets a list of all objects, whcih are known to be the root of a file. The root of a file is the object associated with the top xml element.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetFileObject(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the root object of a file
member.returns: The root object, null if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetForcedRegisteredFile(System.Object,System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Gets the file registered with an object and if not found, a new file is created
member.param: The object an associated file is searched for
Directory in which a new file will be created, if no file exists
member.returns: The associated file

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.DisposeObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes an object of all registrations. To be used for releasing memory
member.param: The object to be removed from registrations

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetAggregate(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the aggregate of an object. The aggregate is an object, which can be used for querying the object in a generic way. The MetaInfo attribute "ObjectAggregate" is used to identify the class type of the aggregate, if not present DefaultAggregate is used. The same aggregate object is reused when the same object is passed.
member.param: The object an aggregate is asked for
member.returns: The aggregate object
member.exception: Cannot find aggregate class type
Cannot instantiate aggregate for known class type

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetKeyFromXml(System.Type,System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a string from an xml file which uniquely identifies the object which is currently parsed This string reflects the identification of the object, e.g. the ID of the object
member.param: Indication whether the current xml element refers to a prior definition of the object
member.returns: The identification string

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetKeyFromObject(Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the key from an object. If the key isn't unique and the property allows for key generation, a unique key is generated.

members.member:
Writes an object to an xml file The registered file of the object will be used as xml file. This is the file to which the object was written to or read from in an earlier stage
The object to be written Cannot derive key for object which must be written as a reference. Probably MetaInfo is missing for the class and subject XmlKeyexception>

Writes an object to an xml file
The object to write The xml file Cannot derive key for object which must be written as a reference. Probably MetaInfo is missing for the class and subject XmlKeyexception>

Writes an object to xml. This will write 1) the type and assembly of the object to write 2) xml attributes for all properties of the object which can be written as xml attributes 3) xml elements for all other properties (this this method is called recursively)
The xml stream The object to be written The object in the xml stream, which is associated with the xml parent element Type of the object Type expected Object associated with the top of the xml stream Name of the xml parent tag List of all object written so far in this xml stream Cannot derive key for object which must be written as a reference. Probably MetaInfo is missing for the class and subject XmlKeyexception>

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.ToString(System.Object,System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Gets the string representing an object. This string value is used for writing the object in an xml file.
member.param: The object a string value is requested for
Directory, which is used in case of files. Then the relative file path is returned
member.returns: The string representation

member.summary: Gets all properties of an aggregate in a sorted way. MetaInfo attribute "XmlIndex" is used for the sorting.
member.returns: Sorted property names

Identifies whether the property is to be written completely or just a reference, because the property has been written before

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.DifferentFiles(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether two objects are written in the same file. This should occur when 1) the root of this object isn't the same as the root writing at this moment or 2) the object is declared that it should be written in it's own file. The root is the object at the top of the xml file
member.returns: Indication same file

member.summary: Indicates whether a property should be written
member.param: The class type of the object containing the property
Identifies whether the property is to be written completely or just a reference, because the property has been written before
member.returns: Boolean indicating whether the property is to be written

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetSingleName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the single word given a plural word. For example, plural word "variables" would return "variable".
member.returns: The single word, "Item" if nothing specific can be derived

member.summary: Gets the property given a specific xml element name

member.returns: Indication of writable as xml attribute

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.XmlFile.GetTempFile(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Gets a temporary file. When writing an xml file, first a temporary file is used and later it is moved to the actually intended file. In this way the original file is left untouched when an exception occurs.
member.param: The directory where the temp file should be located
member.returns: The temporary file

member.name: T:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.ObjectSupport
member.summary: Number of methods for general operations on objects. They comprise: 1. instantiating objects given a class name 2. deep copy of objects

Path where files are copied to

Collection of objects and their copied equivalents. Will be populated and queried during copy.

member.returns: The class object or null if not found
member.exception: Class cannot be found

Value which is passed as argument to the constructor

member.name: T:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate
member.summary: Implementation of IAggregate which is based on reflection. This class is used by XmlFile as default

member.name: T:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate
member.summary: This interface allows generic querying of an object's properties. An aggregate serves as an "in between" object between a source (containing the actual information) and a querier (asking for properties, e.g. XmlFile).

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the class type of one of the properties
member.returns: The property type

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.CanWrite(System.String)
member.summary: Tells whether a value can be assigned to the property
member.returns: Boolean indicating writable

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.CanRead(System.String)
member.summary: Tells whether a value can be retrieved from the property
member.returns: Boolean indicating readable

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of a property
member.returns: The property value

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.SetValue(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the value of a property

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.GetReferencedValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a property value by reference. A reference isn't necessary a property, but can be any string, as long as it can be interpreted by the aggregate
member.returns: The referenced value

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.UpdateSource
member.summary: Tells the aggregate to process all information passed with SetValue calls

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.UpdateAggregate
member.summary: Tells the aggregate to prepare for subsequent GetValue calls

member.name: P:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.Source
member.summary: The underlying object which holds the actual information.

member.name: P:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.IAggregate.Properties
member.summary: List of properties which can be queried in a generic way

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor which gets the underlying source object

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.GetType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the class type of a property by reflection
member.returns: The type of the property

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.CanWrite(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates whether a property can be written to. Reflection is used.
member.returns: Property is writable, false if property doesn't exist

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.CanRead(System.String)
member.summary: Indicates whether a property can be read. Reflection is used.
member.returns: Property is readable, false if property doesn't exist

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.GetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value for a certain property. Reflection is used.
member.returns: The property value, null if the property doesn't exist
member.exception: Internal exception raised by the source object when getting the value

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.SetValue(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a value for a certain property. Reflection is used.
member.exception: Internal exception raised by the source object when setting the value

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.GetReferencedValue(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a referenced value, i.e. a value corresponding with a reference string within the scope of the source. Implementation is delegated to XmlFile.GetRegisteredTarget.
member.returns: The referenced object

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.UpdateSource
member.summary: Intended for updating the source after various SetValue calls. Takes no action, because all SetValue calls are delegated directly to the source object with reflection.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.UpdateAggregate
member.summary: Intended for updating the aggregate before various GetValue calls. Takes no action, because all GetValue calls are delegated directly to the source object with reflection.

member.name: P:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.Source
member.summary: Gets the underlying source object

member.name: P:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.DefaultAggregate.Properties
member.summary: Gets a list of all properties defined in the class type of the source. Reflection is used to get this list.

member.summary: Indicates whether an object is contained by a collection by comparing references. The Equals method is not used, in contrary with the Contains method in the ArrayList.

member.returns: The array

member.name: T:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo
member.summary: This class registers extra information about classes and (optionally) properties in your application. For example, information about how to write a property of a class into an xml file can be stored here. This mechanism has great similarities with the attribute mechanism in the .Net framework, but differences are that 1) entries can be set dynamically 2) no code modification is necessary in the target classes (the classes for which information is stored)

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.Write(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Writes all metainfo to a file

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.Read(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Reads all metainfo from file

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.Initialize
member.summary: Sets metainfo about the xml file where meta info is saved in

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all metainfo concerning a given class
member.returns: All metainfo about a class, null if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetEntryForced(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all metainfo concerning a given class and creates an empty block if not found
member.returns: All metainfo about a class

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.SetAttribute(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Stores information about a class
member.param: The class about which information is stored (usually as class type or string)
The type of information (e.g. how the class is named in an xml file)

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.SetAttribute(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Stores information about a class and property
member.param: The class about which information is stored (usually as class type or string)
The type of information (e.g. how the property is named in an xml file)

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetAttribute(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the stored information for a class. Not only the class is examined, but also all superclasses and implemented interfaces.
member.param: The class about which information will be retrieved
member.returns: The information stored for this object and type of information, null if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetAttribute(System.Type,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the stored information for a class and property. Not only the class is examined, but also all superclasses and implemented interfaces.
member.param: The class type about which information will be retrieved
The property for which information is to be required
member.returns: The information stored for the class and property, null if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetAttributeDefault(System.Type,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the stored information for a class. Not only the class is examined, but also all superclasses and implemented interfaces.
member.param: The object about which information will be retrieved
Default value if the information is not found
member.returns: The information stored for this object and type, the default value if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetAttributeDefault(System.Type,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the stored information for a class and property. Not only the class is examined, but also all superclasses and implemented interfaces.
member.param: The object about which information will be retrieved
Default value if the information is not found
member.returns: The information stored for this class, property and type, the default value if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetAttributeDefault(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the stored information for an assembly.
member.param: The assembly about which information will be retrieved
Default value if the information is not found
member.returns: The information stored for this class, property and type, the default value if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetAttributeDefault(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the stored information for a string
member.param: The string about which information will be retrieved
Default value if the information is not found
member.returns: The information stored for this class, property and type, the default value if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfo.GetProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets a list of all properties in a class, for which a value has been stored. All superclasses and implemented interfaces of the class are examined too.
member.returns: List of properties

member.name: T:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.EntryList
member.summary: Special list for all entered information in MetaInfo

member.summary: Class which groups all information stored for a class in MetaInfo

member.summary: Default constructor

member.summary: Gets a list of all properties for which a value is stored

member.summary: Gets the stored value directly under a class for a certain subject
member.returns: The stored value, null if not found

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfoEntry.SetValue(System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Stores a new value for a subject and property in the class

member.summary: Tells whether a value is stored for a property and subject in the class
member.returns: Indication of presence of the property and subject

member.summary: Class for which information is stored

member.summary: Aggregate class for MetaInfoClass. Used when writing and reading with XmlFile.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfoClassAggregate.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Aggregate for the meta info class An aggregate is an "in between" object between the element set and XmlFile. /> />

member.summary: Class type of a property
member.returns: The property type

member.summary: Tells whether a property can be written
member.returns: Indication of writable

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfoClassAggregate.CanRead(System.String)
member.summary: Tells whether a property can be read

member.returns: The property value

member.summary: Sets a value for a certain property

member.summary: Updates the underlying source. Takes no action.

member.name: M:Oatc.OpenMI.Sdk.DevelopmentSupport.MetaInfoClassAggregate.UpdateAggregate

member.summary: Gets a referenced value, i.e. a value corresponding with a reference string within the scope of the source. Implementation is delegated to XmlFile.GetRegisteredTarget.
member.returns: The referenced object

member.summary: Gets the underlying object
